description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME, PLEASE DISREGARD THE Ariba DISCOVERY POSTING RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME AND CANADABUYS POSTING CLOSING TIME, ALL REQUIRED SUPPORTING DOCUMENTATION AND BID SUBMISSION MUST BE SUBMITTED BY December 8 2023 AT 14 00 EST , ALL BIDS SUBMITTED AFTER 14 00 EST WILL RESULT IN THE BID BEING DECLARED NON RESPONSIVE , THIS REQUIREMENT IS TO ACQUIRE AIRCRAFT PARTS (2 ITEMS - NICAD BATTERIES AND STARTER GENERATORS) FOR THE DASH 8 AIRCRAFT FLEET FOR TRANSPORT CANADA TC THE AIR SERVICES DIRECTORATE ,
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Title and Reference

* Title: NICAD Batteries and Starter Generators for the DASH 8 Aircraft Fleet
* Reference Number: WS4300668910-Doc4302305232

## Tender Details

* Tender Closing Date: December 8, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: December 15, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: December 13, 2024

## Tender Type and Procedure

* Tender Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Tendering Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

## Goods and Services Required

* Acquisition of aircraft parts, including:
	+ NICAD Batteries
	+ Starter Generators
* Total procurement value: Not specified

## End-User Entity and Address

* End-User Entity: Department of Transport (TC)
* Address: 330 Sparks Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0N8, Canada

## Contact Information

* Valerie Bourassa (SPAC/PSPC) - valerie.bourassa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Contracting Entity

* Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

## Notice and Attachment

* Notice URL: Not available
* Attachment: Not available due to sensitive information

**New Information**

Please note that the originally scheduled Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time are disregarded. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be received by December 8, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive. The tender description, including the requirement quotation, is detailed under Annex A. Only qualified Supply Arrangement holders for procurement of T8493-140035 series for the DASH 8 Aircraft Fleet are eligible to participate in the procurement process. The announcement is open for competitive bidding. The UNSPSC code for this procurement is 25201601, classified under Aircraft digital altitude control systems. The procurement is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and regions of delivery are limited to Ottawa. The contractor is expected to collaborate with the contracting entity, Transportation Canada, for the delivery of goods. The procurement is announced under the Procurement
